effect_entries.effect: Records some of the trainer's activities for the day.
effect_entries.short_effect: Records prior significant activities the player took.

flavor_text_entries.text:
これまでの　冒険の　様子が
記録　されている　ノート。

A notebook that keeps a day-to-day
record of your adventure so far.

Diario in cui viene annotata la tua avventura
giorno per giorno.

Carta del Profesor Oak en la que se te pide que
vayas a la Ruta 224.

In diesem Tagebuch steht, was du
in den letzten Tagen erlebt hast.

Un journal de bord qui garde en mémoire vos
aventures quotidiennes.

지금까지의 모험 상황이
기록되어 있는 노트.

これまでの　ぼうけんの　ようすが
きろく　されている　ノート。

A notebook that keeps a day-to-day
record of your adventure so far.
